metadata.title: CVE-2017-14642 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in the AP4_HdlrAtom class inBento4 version 1.5.0-617. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault andapplication crash in AP4_StdcFileByteStream::ReadPartial inSystem/StdC/Ap4StdCFileByteStream.cpp, which leads to remote denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
